title: Thank you, Riot ❤
body:
I want to send my most honest and greatest "Thank you" to all Rioters involved on the development in such a beautiful, strong and radiant character.
Naive but determined. 
Not looking so strong as other bigger characters in the game but still with an incredible inner power and amazing abilities in combat. 
A born leader worth respecting.
So unique.
So pure.
So unbreakable.
So perfect.
I will always be grateful to Riot for showing me the greatest and most precious female character in the world of MOBA games.
{{sticker:sg-jinx}}


https://i.imgur.com/NJTQglX.jpg


I am talking, of course, about Poppy. {{champion:78}} 
(Pic unrelated.)
{{sticker:sg-poppy}}
